title: Corporate Flux
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne et technologique caractérisé par un design plat, des proportions géométriques exagérées et une absence totale d'ombrage. Il présente un trait net et uniforme combiné à des aplats de couleur, dépeignant souvent des éléments d'interface flottants et des figures humaines simplifiées pour évoquer le flux de travail et l'interaction numérique.
description_en: A quintessential modern tech vector illustration style characterized by flat design, exaggerated geometric proportions, and a distinct lack of shading. It features clean, uniform line work combined with solid blocks of color, often depicting floating interface elements and simplified human figures to convey workflow and digital interaction.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne et technologique caractérisé par un design plat, des proportions géométriques exagérées et une absence totale d'ombrage. Il présente un trait net et uniforme combiné à des aplats de couleur, dépeignant souvent des éléments d'interface flottants et des figures humaines simplifiées pour évoquer le flux de travail et l'interaction numérique.
prompt: A pristine, professional flat vector illustration executed in the style of modern 'Corporate Memphis' or 'Alegria' tech aesthetics, featuring {{subject}} integrated into a dynamic, abstract digital workspace. The medium is pure digital vector art (SVG style), characterized by mathematically perfect Bezier curves, crisp anti-aliased edges, and zero texture or grain. The rendering technique relies exclusively on solid, unshaded distinct color blocks bounded by thin, uniform-weight ink-black contour lines. The subject is depicted with simplified, geometric anatomy—smooth, flowing limbs without muscular detail, stylized features, and oversized clothing shapes that emphasize silhouette over realism. {{subject}} is surrounded by a floating orbit of abstract user interface elements: rounded rectangles, browser windows, stylized documents, and data panels that curve through the composition to suggest depth without using perspective shading. The lighting is completely flat and symbolic; there are no cast shadows, no ambient occlusion, and no highlights, creating a 2D graphic look. The color palette utilizes {{primary_color}} for the main clothing or central elements and {{accent_color}} for focal points like buttons, screens, or interaction markers, set against neutral grays and whites for secondary panels. The atmosphere is productive, frictionless, and optimistic, typical of SaaS branding and startup visual identity. Background elements include 'confetti' shapes—small floating plus signs, hollow circles, and geometric primitives—scattered to balance the negative space. The composition is open and airy, with elements bleeding off the edges to suggest an infinite digital canvas. {{mood}} energy is conveyed through the posture of the subject and the rhythmic arrangement of the floating panels. Reinforcement tags: flat design, vector graphics, corporate art style, alegria aesthetic, uniform line weight, minimal illustration, tech startup branding, geometric abstraction, clean lines, solid fills, no gradients, no shading, adobe illustrator, svg style, user interface concept, playful minimalism, simplified anatomy, digital workflow, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas.
prompt_removebg: A pristine, professional flat vector illustration executed in the style of modern 'Corporate Memphis' or 'Alegria' tech aesthetics, featuring {{subject}} integrated into a dynamic, abstract digital workspace, composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface. The medium is pure digital vector art (SVG style), characterized by mathematically perfect Bezier curves, crisp anti-aliased edges, and zero texture or grain. The rendering technique relies exclusively on solid, unshaded distinct color blocks bounded by thin, uniform-weight ink-black contour lines. The subject is depicted with simplified, geometric anatomy—smooth, flowing limbs without muscular detail, stylized features, and oversized clothing shapes that emphasize silhouette over realism. {{subject}} is surrounded by a floating orbit of abstract user interface elements: rounded rectangles, browser windows, stylized documents, and data panels that curve through the composition to suggest depth without using perspective shading. The lighting is completely flat and symbolic; there are no cast shadows, no ambient occlusion, and no highlights, creating a 2D graphic look. The color palette utilizes {{primary_color}} for the main clothing or central elements and {{accent_color}} for focal points like buttons, screens, or interaction markers, set against neutral grays and whites for secondary panels. The atmosphere is productive, frictionless, and optimistic. The entire composition is rendered against a flat {{background_color}} backdrop, ensuring that the thin black outlines and solid color fills maintain a sharp, vector-cut silhouette against the {{background_color}} field with no fringing or semi-transparent gradients. Background elements include 'confetti' shapes—small floating plus signs, hollow circles, and geometric primitives—scattered to balance the negative space, all clearly defined against the {{background_color}}. {{mood}} energy is conveyed through the posture. Reinforcement tags: flat design, vector graphics, corporate art style, alegria aesthetic, uniform line weight, minimal illustration, tech startup branding, geometric abstraction, clean lines, solid fills, no gradients, no shading, adobe illustrator, svg style, user interface concept, playful minimalism, simplified anatomy, digital workflow, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas, {{background_color}} background.
background_prompt: An abstract, flat vector background illustration depicting a floating digital ecosystem of user interface elements. The scene features drifting geometric panels, rounded rectangles representing browser windows, and stylized blank documents arranged in a loose, orbital composition. The style is strictly 2D flat design with thin, uniform black outlines and solid color fills, devoid of any shading, texture, or gradients. The palette uses neutral greys and whites for the panels, punctuated by {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} geometric primitives—small plus signs, hollow circles, and squares—scattered like digital confetti throughout the negative space. The layout suggests a frictionless, organized tech environment, with the shapes flowing dynamically across the frame to imply a sense of process and workflow.
background_prompt_removebg: An abstract, flat vector background illustration depicting a floating digital ecosystem of user interface elements, rendered against a flat {{background_color}} backdrop. The scene features drifting geometric panels, rounded rectangles representing browser windows, and stylized blank documents arranged in a loose, orbital composition. The style is strictly 2D flat design with thin, uniform black outlines and solid color fills, devoid of any shading, texture, or gradients. The palette uses neutral greys and whites for the panels, punctuated by {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} geometric primitives—small plus signs, hollow circles, and squares—scattered like digital confetti throughout the negative space. A decorative, minimalist frame of {{primary_color}} geometric shapes and thin lines overlays the foreground edges, creating a sense of depth before fading cleanly into the {{background_color}} surface. The layout suggests a frictionless, organized tech environment, with the shapes flowing dynamically across the frame.
